title: Natural Ambiances Vol. 2 - Rain Sounds - Thunder Sounds - Wind Sounds
description: 50 Premium Natural Ambient Loops That Will Take Your Game To The Next Level!
longDescription:
**All sounds have been completely reworked and optimized for UE5!

> LISTEN HERE <

> View The File List <

*All Ambiances Loop Seamlessly

﻿* Add $12 and get our Ultimate SFX Bundle (9k+ Sounds) which includes all of our current and future packs! *


In this pack you will find 50 (5 Times more than Vol 1) professionally recorded natural ambiances ranging from snowfall to dripping caves and even lively jungles!


In this pack you will find 50 Seamlessly looping ambiances including:

  • Forest (Day Time & Night Time)
  • Jungle (With & Without Rain)
  • Beach (With & Without People)
  • Waves Crashing on rocks
  • Ocean
  • River
  • Waterfall
  • Swamp
  • Cave
  • Desert (+ Desert Storm)
  • Crickets at night
  • Wind (Light, Normal, Heavy)
  • Rain (Light, Normal, Heavy)
  • Snow (Light, Normal, Heavy)
  • Hail
  • Rain Storm
  • Snow Storm
  • Thunder Storm
  • Wind Storm
  • Tropical Storm


All the loops were carefully mixed and mastered by a professional sound engineer.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 50

Number of Audio Cues: 50

Sample rate / bit rate: (44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs)

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes)
